org.openimaj.audio

Class AudioMixer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.audio.Audio
      • org.openimaj.audio.AudioStream
        • org.openimaj.audio.AudioMixer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<SampleChunk>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolyphonicSynthesizer

    public class AudioMixer
extends AudioStream
    A basic audio mixer that takes a number of AudioStreams and mixes then with some gain compensation into a single audio stream.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
    Created:
    23rd November 2011

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AudioMixer.MixEventListener
      A listener for objects that wish to be informed of a mix event.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioMixer

        public AudioMixer(AudioFormat af)
        Default constructor that takes the format for the samples. All streams added to this mixer must conform to that sample format.
        Parameters:
        af - The AudioFormat

    • Method Detail

      • setTimecodeObject

        public void setTimecodeObject(AudioTimecode tc)
        The timecode object
        Parameters:
        tc - The timecode object.

      • addStream

        public void addStream(AudioStream as,
                      float defaultGain)
        Add an AudioStream to this mixer. It must conform to the same format as this mixer. If not, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        as - The AudioStream to add to this mixer.
        defaultGain - The default gain of this stream.

      • nextSampleChunk

        public SampleChunk nextSampleChunk()
        Retrieve the next SampleChunk from the audio stream.
        Specified by:
        nextSampleChunk in class AudioStream
        Returns:
        The next sample chunk in the audio stream.
        See Also:
        AudioStream.nextSampleChunk()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the audio stream.
        Specified by:
        reset in class AudioStream
        See Also:
        AudioStream.reset()

      • setBufferSize

        public void setBufferSize(int bufferSize)
        Set the size of the buffer that the mixer will mix. Note that this must be done before any streams are added to the mixer.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - The buffer size in samples per channel.

      • setAlwaysRun

        public void setAlwaysRun(boolean alwaysRun)
        Whether to run the mixer when there are no audio streams to mix.
        Parameters:
        alwaysRun - TRUE to make the mixer always run.

      • addMixEventListener

        public void addMixEventListener(AudioMixer.MixEventListener mel)
        Add a mix event listener to this AudioMixer.
        Parameters:
        mel - The AudioMixer.MixEventListener to add

      • removeMixEventListener

        public void removeMixEventListener(AudioMixer.MixEventListener mel)
        Remove the given AudioMixer.MixEventListener from this mixer.
        Parameters:
        mel - The AudioMixer.MixEventListener to remove

      • getLength

        public long getLength()
        Returns the length of the audio stream in milliseconds. If the length is unknown (for a live stream for example), then this method should return -1.
        Specified by:
        getLength in class AudioStream
        Returns:
        The length in milliseconds, or -1
        See Also:
        AudioStream.getLength()

      • setMixEvents

        public void setMixEvents(boolean tf)
        Whether to fire mix events or not (default is that the mixer doesn't)
        Parameters:
        tf - TRUE to fire mix events.

      • removeStream

        public void removeStream(AudioStream as)
        Remove the given audio stream from the mixer.
        Parameters:
        as - The audio stream to remove
